martialStyles.name: Longsword
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Excellent for beginners due to balanced approach. Strong in stance-based environments.

martialStyles.name: Battle Axe
synergies: Frost Magic for slowing opponents while building momentum
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Excels in prolonged exchanges where momentum can build. Vulnerable if momentum is disrupted.

martialStyles.name: Bow
martialStyles.playStyle: Range advantage and precision with positioning mechanics
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Struggles when forced into close range. Excellent in open environments with line of sight.

martialStyles.name: Shortsword & Shield
martialStyles.playStyle: Defensive with powerful counters and endurance
martialStyles.resourceSystem: Shield integrity (defensive resource that builds and depletes)
synergies: Frost Magic for control and defense
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Most resilient style with high survivability. Can struggle to close out games without offensive pairing.

martialStyles.name: Rapier & Dagger
martialStyles.playStyle: Technical, combo-oriented with emphasis on reactions
martialStyles.resourceSystem: Precision points (for executing perfect attacks and ripostes)
synergies: Lightning Magic for speed and precision
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: High skill ceiling with rewarding mechanics for expert players. Vulnerable to brute force approaches.

martialStyles.name: Spear
martialStyles.playStyle: Zone control, range manipulation, keep-away tactics
martialStyles.resourceSystem: Reach advantage (benefits from maintaining optimal distance)
synergies: Air Magic for mobility and range control
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Excellent at dictating the range of engagement. Weaker when flanked or when opponent closes distance rapidly.

martialStyles.name: Thrown Weapons
martialStyles.playStyle: Resource management, tactical positioning, sustained ranged pressure
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Requires careful resource management. Strong early game presence with potential mid-game vulnerability.

martialStyles.name: Quarterstaff
martialStyles.playStyle: Balanced offense/defense with excellent range transitions
martialStyles.resourceSystem: Positioning advantage (gains benefits from active range switching)
martialStyles.additionalConsiderations: Most adaptable martial style. Excels at exploiting environment changes and responding to opponent strategies.

magicalStyles.name: Water Magic
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Excels against aggressive opponents. Can struggle to establish initiative in passive matchups.

magicalStyles.name: Fire Magic
synergies: Battle Axe for momentum and damage escalation
Thrown Weapons for multiple damage sources
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Strong against defensive styles. Vulnerable if heat buildup is interrupted.

magicalStyles.name: Earth Magic
synergies: Battle Axe for stability while building momentum
Longsword for balanced defense and offense
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Most durable magical style. Effective at controlling the battlefield and dictating pace.

magicalStyles.name: Blood Magic
magicalStyles.resourceSystem: Vitality (converting health into power and effects)
synergies: Battle Axe for reckless offensive power
Shortsword & Shield to mitigate health loss
Rapier & Dagger for precise application of sacrifice
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Creates exciting tension through gambling mechanics. Powerful effects balanced by self-damage. Rewards skillful health management and calculated risk-taking.

magicalStyles.name: Lightning Magic
magicalStyles.resourceSystem: Charge (building electrical energy for chain attacks)
synergies: Thrown Weapons for multiple attack vectors
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Highest burst damage potential. Vulnerable when charge is depleted or against grounded opponents.

magicalStyles.name: Shadow Magic
magicalStyles.resourceSystem: Shroud (hiding information and setting up surprise attacks)
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Excels at manipulation and controlling information. Less effective against highly aggressive opponents.

magicalStyles.name: Frost Magic
magicalStyles.resourceSystem: Chill (accumulating to slow and eventually freeze opponents)
synergies: Shortsword & Shield for defense while building chill
Bow for applying chill from distance
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Strong against combo-oriented styles. Can struggle against styles with burst damage.

magicalStyles.name: Arcane Magic
magicalStyles.resourceSystem: Mana (versatile resource that can convert between different effects)
synergies: Any style that benefits from tactical resource management
magicalStyles.additionalConsiderations: Most versatile magical style. High skill ceiling but rewards mastery with unparalleled adaptability.
